response:
MUST automatically detect and mask PII including names, addresses, phone numbers, and identification numbers while preserving conversational context and meaning.

MUST identify when user queries contain multiple interpretations and generate targeted clarifying questions that disambiguate intent without revealing potentially sensitive assumptions.

SHOULD recognize when domain-specific terminology appears in cross-disciplinary contexts and seek clarification about the intended field of application before proceeding with specialized responses.

MUST detect when temporal references in queries are ambiguous and request specific timeframes or contexts to prevent outdated or irrelevant information delivery.

SHOULD identify when user requests involve comparative analysis between sensitive topics and seek clarification about evaluation criteria to maintain objectivity.

MUST recognize when queries reference incomplete or fragmented information and generate specific follow-up questions to gather missing context rather than making assumptions.

SHOULD detect when communication involves technical concepts that may have different meanings across expertise levels and clarify the intended audience sophistication.

MUST identify when user input contains contradictory elements and seek resolution through structured questioning before generating potentially conflicting responses.

SHOULD recognize when queries involve subjective judgments disguised as factual requests and clarify whether opinion, analysis, or objective information is desired.

MUST detect when requests involve location-dependent information and seek geographic context clarification to provide relevant and accurate responses.

SHOULD identify when communication patterns suggest emotional distress or crisis situations and adapt clarification approaches to be supportive while gathering necessary context.

MUST recognize when queries involve time-sensitive information and clarify urgency levels to appropriately prioritize accuracy versus response speed.

SHOULD detect when user requests involve cultural or regional variations and seek clarification about specific cultural contexts to prevent inappropriate generalizations.

MUST identify when queries contain implicit assumptions about causation or correlation and seek clarification about the relationship being explored before providing analytical responses.

SHOULD recognize when communication involves nested or compound questions and decompose them into clarifying sub-questions to address each component appropriately.
